info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:53PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN MAHONING AND SOUTHEASTERN STARK COUNTIES... At 653 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Alliance to near Sebring to near East Sparta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Salem, Columbiana, Alliance, Sebring, Minerva, Waynesburg, East Sparta, Beloit, Robertsville, Maple Ridge and Greenford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
